2A3CBA52.VoiceDir19.ACEF6: This wolf met us earlier in the game and helped us through a maze of Horadric magic

40121503.Line17.ACEF6: Once you’ve brought peace to this realm, I will be able to give you my blessing.

7234A87D.Line11.ACEF6: That mortal Elias seeks to use the power of the Primes for his own ends. No one knows their place anymore, do they?

A61D9B81.Line15.ACEF6: His meddling has drawn echoes of the past to my refuge of Hatred. But you and I can put things back in order.

DD9C3BA7.Line5.BAE4: Mephisto. I know who you are now.

F71E3DEE.Line3.ACEF6: Yes, but that doesn’t mean we can’t help each other.
